text: Macrobdella is a genus of leeches native to freshwater ecosystems of North America, especially Canada, Mexico, and the United States. The genus is commonly referred to as North American medicinal leeches. == Species == * Macrobdella decora (Say, 1824) * Macrobdella diplotertia (Meyer, 1975) * Macrobdella ditetra (Moore, 1953) * Macrobdella mimicus (Philips, Salas- Montiel, Kvist, Oceguera-Figueroa, 2019) * Macrobdella sestertia (Whitman, 1886) == References == Category:Leeches
title: Macrobdella
